mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (MEMBER_ID, PASSWORD, NICKNAME, NAME, EMAIL, PHONE) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
SELECT MEMBER_ID FROM MEMBER WHERE EMAIL = #{email}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE EMAIL = #{email}
SELECT NAME FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
SELECT NICKNAME FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET PASSWORD = #{password}, NICKNAME = #{nickname}, NAME = #{name}, EMAIL = #{email}, PHONE = #{phone} WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
